meanings.definition: The quality or state of being detachable.
meanings.sent1: The detachability of the toy made it easy for the child to play with.
meanings.sent2: The detachability of the parts allowed for easy assembly.
meanings.sent3: The detachability of the puzzle pieces led to a fun and challenging game.
meanings.sent4: Her detachability from the situation surprised everyone.
meanings.sent5: The detachability of the Velcro made it a convenient fastening option.

meanings.definition: The ability to be separated or disconnected from something else.
meanings.sent1: The detachability of the phone case made it easy to clean.
meanings.sent2: The detachability of the cable allowed for easy storage.
meanings.sent3: The detachability of the magnets provided endless entertainment for the kids.
meanings.sent4: His detachability from his emotions made him seem distant.
meanings.sent5: The detachability of the keychain made it convenient to use.
